title: Client Relations Manager - Spain (m/f/d)
content:
Allow us to introduce ourselves
Hello there! Weâ€™re Appinio, the fastest (and coolest) market research platform. On a mission to make the world a little more fact-based, we help companies understand how consumers think and make better data-driven decisions.
We started out in Hamburg back in 2014 but weâ€™re now humbled to call the world our playground, with over 200 employees spread across 25 cities (weâ€™re remote-first), 2000+ international clients and a panel reach of 7 million, globally.
Want to be a part of the Appinio movement? ðŸš€

Your mission as a Client Relations Manager - Spain 
Join Appinio's dynamic team as a Client Relations Manager - Spain (m/f/d) and play a pivotal role in driving our expansion and consolidating the Appinio brand in the Spanish market. We are seeking a highly skilled and sales-driven individual with exceptional soft skills to excel in this crucial position.
As a Client Relations Manager, you will collaborate closely with our Managing Director - Spain, becoming a reliable sparring partner for new clients. Your expertise will be instrumental in advising and coaching clients on the significance and potential of market research, innovation, and consumer centricity. Your ability to inspire marketing and insight decision-makers in Spain will be essential in promoting Appinio's unique Saas solutions and persuading C-Level Executives to collaborate with us.
We strongly prefer candidates based in Spain; however, we welcome applications from exceptional individuals located anywhere in the world, as the opportunity to drive our business remotely is available.
What youâ€™ll be doing

Represent Appinio to marketing and insights decision-makers of multinational companies
Acquire new customers and provide expert advice and coaching on Appinio's agile Saas solutions
Scope and qualify client requirements for both new and existing projects
Ensure delivery of high-quality outputs that meet client and service requirements, serving as a liaison between clients and internal departments
Maximize revenue opportunities from existing and new client bases, aligning with the client's research roadmap
Build and maintain a robust professional network
Act as a public speaker, presenting at events and trade fairs
Contribute to the further development of our business, including expanding our presence in the Spanish market and supporting Latam market development as needed

You will thrive in this role if

You have 3+ years of proven experience and an extensive network in the market research industry, coupled with a strong customer-centric mindset, which are mandatory requirements for this role
You have an above-average degree in business administration, economics, or a related field
You have several years of successful experience in B2B sales, with proficiency in sales methods, lead generation, and customer acquisition in the Spanish market
You have native fluency in Spanish and excellent communication skills in English
You have proficiency in working with CRM tools such as Salesforce or Hubspot
You have strong analytical and critical thinking abilities
You have an empathetic nature with a keen sense for understanding the needs of others
You are based in Spain, preferably in Madrid

Whatâ€™s in it for you?

Flexibility Policy - meaning there is no hard cap on the number of vacation days
Work-from-anywhere Policy 

You have the chance to develop our amazing product from one of the countries where we operate: Spain, France, Germany, Portugal, the Netherlands or the UK.
You have the chance to work outside of your country of residence for a maximum of 180 days per year, given that you have a valid work permit for that country


Udemy L&D Platform - full access to 22,000+ courses and certifications to deepen your knowledge as your career progresses
All the hardware you need and your own MacBook
In case you're located in Hamburg or Berlin, you'll get a Deutschlandticket or access to a mobility budget with the RYDES app to get you to and from the office space
In case you're located in Hamburg you'll get access to our beautiful office in Hamburg's city center - terrace and BBQ included ;-)
In case you're located in Berlin, you will have access to our co-working space to get together with our fellow Appinioneers
In case you are located in Germany or Spain, you will have access to a Subsidized Urban Sports Club membership





This post not only outlines our ideal candidate but also serves as an inspiration for what this role can evolve into. Even if you consider yourself an 80% fit but have a genuine passion for this position, we encourage you to apply. We're eager to hear from individuals who share our enthusiasm.
Appinio is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.
